hadiths.text: Talha b. Musarrif reported:I asked 'Abdullah b. Abu Aufa whether Allah's Messenger (ï·º) had made any will (in regard to his property). He said: NO. I said: Then why has making of will been made necessary for the Muslims, or why were they commanded to make will? Thereupon he said: He made the will according to the Book of Allah, the Exalted and Majestic
